content:
Hi all,

I am new to the wasmtime repo and was looking to hack around a bit. I saw how to use clif-util to compile and run some cranelift IR. However, is there a way to view the IR that cranelift generates while compiling down a full .wasm file? For example, if I have a program, test.c that I compile to test.wasm with WASI sdk, can I intercept the IR generated when running with wasmtime test.wasm etc? Or, is there a way / tool to take the test.wasm file and get to the cranelift IR that cranelift would use?

Thanks!
